project_abstract.cdata: The Highway Maintenance Project for Burundi consists of implementation of a four-year highway maintenance program; pre-investment studies for improvement of the Ngozi-Muyinga-Kobero road; preparation of a master plan for further road development and additional feasibility studies; refinancing of Credit S11-BU.
